response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $800,000. This offer represents an outstanding value considering the product's true worth to you is estimated at $1,000,000. We are confident that you will find this proposal compelling and hope to have the privilege of serving you soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 800000}
